article_title: YC grad SINAI helps companies understand their emissions in a bid to fight climate change
article_description: The first step to combating climate change for businesses is for them to understand their contributions to it  That s where the new Y Combinator graduate  SINAI Technologies  comes in  Founded by Maria Fujihara  a 16 year veteran of the sustainability industr
